thread.title: W Taipei presents “A TIME FOR YOGA” charity events
thread.title_full: W Taipei presents “A TIME FOR YOGA” charity events

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: W Taipei presents “A TIME FOR YOGA” charity events
text:
W Taipei presents “A TIME FOR YOGA” charity events W Taipei presents “A TIME FOR YOGA” charity events Details Created   12:00 Repainting entire streets with an obscure colour scheme W Taipei will host two Charity Yoga Events together with PURE YOGA, Impact Eco Wear, Clean the World, bliss, FIJI Water, VIASWEAT and also the media partner MILK X Magazine as well as two Charity Organizations, namely Taiwan Foundation For Rare Disorders and Clinical Oncology Research Foundation on September 13th and October 4th, 2015 from 09:30am to 12:00pm at the WET Deck outdoor area, level 10 of W Taipei. 
These charity events “A TIME FOR YOGA” will include a 75-min yoga session conducted by PURE YOGA instructors Angela and Jun using the Tunes of W Taipei Music Curator Sona Eyambe, a healthy breakfast and impact Eco Wear yoga mats & T shirts, PURE YOGA makeup bags, VIASWEAT tote bags, FIJI water sets, Clean the World soaps (on Sep 13th event) and bliss amenities (on Oct 4th event). The event admission is charged at TWD2,000 per person from which TWD1,500 will be donated to Taiwan Foundation for Rare Disorders and Clinical Oncology Research Foundation. “We are delighted to organize and host these two charity events with our heartwarming partners. A TIME For Yoga Charity Event is a very important event to our local community which I am totally devoted to support.” Shared by Cary M. Gray, General Manager of W Taipei, “It’s as meaningful for us to provide a unique and detox yoga experience by the WET pool at the W Taipei as it is to contribute to those in need”. In a natural environment with the chic design at WET Deck with a panoramic view of the spectacular skyline, 70 exclusive guests will be pampered with the ultimate relaxation, immersed in the lounge music by W Taipei Music Curator Sona Eyambe, and learn the methods of effective muscle strengthening, balancing system, mental and physical well-being. “A TIME FOR YOGA” Events Details Dates: September 13th & October 4th, 2015 Registration Time: August 31st to October 3rd 06:00AM-10:00PM Registration Venue: FIT Gym of W Taipei Level 12 (Limited offered, cash only) Related articles
